This is a test

Property.name: FromEnvironment
Property.Description: Comparisons will be made against this named environment as the "expected" If this is not a Historical View Report enter here the name of the Environment against which other environments will be compared.

Property.name: HistoricView
Property.Description: If this is a Historical Report then historical changes for the FROM environment will be shown only

Property.name: DisplayDifferenceDetail
Property.Description: If enabled a full list of differences are displayed in report view If disabled only a concise summary information is visible with some difference detail available as "Tool Tip"

Property.name: DisplayComments
Property.Description: If enabled - show recorded comments aginst differences

Property.name: WorksheetTabName
Property.Description: Excel Worksheet TabName are constrained to a 31 characters Allows shorter worksheet Alias

Property.name: Environments
Property.Description: An array of available environments and namespaces to analyse

Property.name: ListCategory
Property.Description: A Textual Category to Aggregate / Organise Reports within thir List View

Method.name: FromEnvironmentNameSpace
CreateDynamicReport
Method.Description: Generate a new dynamic report based on a specific class or routine only <example> set type="cls" set name="Interfaces.Common.Base" set tSC=##class(LabTechUK.SourceUtil.Report.Definition).CreateDynamicReport(,, type,name,.report) <example>

Method.name: ProcessReport
GetDateTimeOfData
Method.Implementation: Quit:env="" "" set date=+$P($G(^ompare("Data",env)),"^") Quit:date=0 "" set time=+$P($G(^ompare("Data",env)),"^",2) Quit:time=0 "" Quit $ZDT(date_","_time,3)

Method.name: IsEmptyReport
IsEmptyReportType
Method.Implementation: set key="",isEmpty=1 for { quit:'isEmpty set reportType=..ReportTypes.GetNext(.key) quit:key="" continue:'$IsObject(reportType) set isEmpty=reportType.IsEmptyReportType(type) } quit isEmpty

Method.name: DiffSignatureByNVP
Method.Description:
Data is held as Name-Value-Pair with an expected delimiter
Assumes order of lines is unimportant
Generates counts for lines that are Missing, Extra, Different or Same

Method.name: ListReportByCategory
Method.Description: Creates an array of ReportCategories and their reports
Method.Implementation: &SQL(DECLARE ReportByCategory CURSOR for SELECT ReportName, ListCategory INTO :report,:category from ompare_Report.Definition) &SQL(OPEN ReportByCategory) for { &SQL(FETCH ReportByCategory) Quit:+SQLCODE'=0 continue:report="" set:category="" category=" " set aryListByCategory(category,report)="" set aryListByReport(report,category)="" } &SQL(CLOSE ReportByCategory)

Method.name: ListAvailableOrgsSystem
Method.Description: Populate an array with the list of current Systems as found in loaded data

Method.name: MatchSystem
Method.Description: Returns whether the namespace in the given environment matches the given System Identifier ie: Is this code in the same Product development stream?
Method.Implementation: quit:environment="" 0 quit:namespace="" 0 quit:System="" 0 set data=$G(^ompare("Data",environment,namespace)) quit:data="" 0 quit System=$P($G(data),"^",8)

Method.name: MatchOrganisation
Method.Description: Returns whether the namespace in the given environment matches the given Organisation Identifier ie: Is this code in the same organisation development stream?
Method.Implementation: quit:environment="" 0 quit:namespace="" 0 quit:Organisation="" 0 set data=$G(^ompare("Data",environment,namespace)) quit:data="" 0 quit Organisation=$P($G(data),"^",7)

Method.name: Compare
Method.Description: Generic comparison method Driven by the process private Test global Generated output to ^||ReportData ^||ReportData(type,name,"s",toEnv,toNs)=result ^||ReportData(type,name,"d",subtype,subname,toEnv,toNs)

Method.name: IsTypeIncluded
Method.Description: Verify whether the type (Class / Routine) should be included for reporting Based on Report configuration for generally excluding and then explicitly including type names.

Method.name: IsMatch
Method.Description: Method returns value 1 to indicate the test value has been matched

Method.name: PopulateFromHttpRequest
DrawEditConfigForm
DrawViewReport
